game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden deep within the jungle.
game.description: In a forgotten land, legends speak of a powerful artifact with unimaginable powers. The artifact is said to be hidden deep within a treacherous jungle, guarded by mystical creatures and ancient traps. Are you brave enough to embark on this dangerous quest and retrieve the artifact?
game.reward: Ancient knowledge and treasure beyond your wildest dreams.

task.objective: Get a map to the artifact from Professor Indiana in Town of Arcadia.
task.description: To begin your quest, locate Professor Indiana and obtain his map that will guide you to the artifact's location. Beware of the jungle's perils at every step.
